pages.text: Header Logo Authentic German & European Cuisine Main Navigation Home Lunch Dinner Beer/Liquor Specials German Bread About Us Location/Contact End Header Content & Sidebar Content About Us Welcome to our Restaurant! Sandra’s Restaurant is German owned and operated and proud to serve Authentic German & European Cuisine. We use only high quality ingredients and your food is cooked to order using our own traditional German and European family recipes. Our prices are affordable and our friendly staff is always determined to offer you the best service. To accompany our authentic cuisine we offer a nice selection of German wine and imported German beers. We have 7 different German beers on tap: Kölsch, Hofbräu Lager, Hofbräu Dunkel (Dark), Spaten Lager, Weihenstephaner Weizen (Wheat), and always a choice of seasonal Pils and Dark Beer. In addition we sometimes offer beer specials like authentic Oktoberfest Beer from Munich, Doppelbock Lager and Maibock (very popular and available only for a limited time when in season). Whether you are looking for place to have a romantic dinner or to spend an evening with family or friends, we are sure you will love our food and the warm and relaxing atmosphere of our restaurant. Please come and join us for Lunch or Dinner. We are looking forward to serve you. Reservations accepted.
